header.title: Get a simple, easy to understand visual from your Amazon MTR.
header.description: Fliqbook converts your Amazon MTR into beautiful charts and summary tables to get a clear visualization of your monthly sales and taxes.

button.label: SIGN up for a free trial

sections.header: Convert your amazon mTR into graphs, charts for better visualization

list.text: Understand the contribution of individual ASIN in your total sales and revenue.
Get percentage of the order amounts that are returned, replaced or cancelled from the total monthly transaction
Check the contribution of gst and tcs from your total Amazon sales, ASIN wise sales
Receive accurate total margin and ASIN wise margin distribution
